name: Show my fantastic rc aircrafts
short_description:
Rely on patent technology the uniquemodel Co., Limited is dedicated to the designing and manufacturing of first class R/C model products , this design and manufacture mode assure the control ability for the advanced technology and manufacture cost. The strong human recourse can offer high scale&power function competitive products to the customers in the mareket
In the development of new products，we actively exchange and learning from domestic and fordeign counterparts , pay attention to ourself’s cretive ability and make a valuable innovation. In aircraft design, we pay attention to make high scale and easy control model so as to offer perfect products to the customers.
